title: "Person in the position of a seller"
context: ยง490:2-707 &ldquo;Person in the position of a seller&rdquo;. (1) A &ldquo;person in the position of a seller&rdquo; includes as against a principal an agent who has paid or become responsible for the price of goods on behalf of his principal or anyone who otherwise holds a security interest or other right in goods similar to that of a seller. (2) A person in the position of a seller may as provided in this article withhold or stop delivery (section 490:2-705) and resell (section 490:2-706) and recover incidental damages (section 490:2-710). [L 1965, c 208, ยง2-707; HRS ยง490:2-707]
